apple_vendor_description: This loving emoji on Apple devices showcases two women sharing a tender kiss, with one depicted in a medium-dark skin tone and the other in a medium-light skin tone. Apple's design language brings this image to life with vibrant, yet soft, colors and a glossy 3D effect that accentuates the gentle curves and intimate connection. Realistic lighting highlights their expressions, conveying affection, romance, and celebration of love in all its forms, a beautiful representation on Apple devices.
